tidbits.title: Dual Nationality
tidbits.description: Sint Maarten shares the island of Saint Martin with the French overseas collectivity of Saint-Martin, creating a unique blend of Dutch and French cultures.

tidbits.title: Tourist Haven
tidbits.description: The island is a popular tourist destination, renowned for its beautiful beaches, vibrant nightlife, and duty-free shopping in Philipsburg, the capital.

tidbits.title: Spectacular Aircraft Landings
tidbits.description: Princess Juliana International Airport in Sint Maarten is famous for its low-altitude aircraft landings over Maho Beach, offering thrilling experiences for plane enthusiasts.
